title: The Heavenly Demon Can’t Live a Normal Life - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Age Regression   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Aristocracy   Army   Army Building   Calm Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Empires   Enemies Become Allies   European Ambience   Famous Protagonist   Fantasy World   Fearless Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Harsh Training   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Kingdom Building   Kingdoms   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Politics   Pragmatic Protagonist   Previous Life Talent   Proactive Protagonist   Royalty   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Transmigration   Wars   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters

description:
The Heavenly Demon, Baek Jung-hyuk, woke up as the eldest son of the Dmitry family.

He was known as the fool of the Dmitry family. He was trampled on by the second son. What people thought of him didn't matter.

The Heavenly Demon. No, Roman Dmitry, cannot live a normal life. >
